forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain in the morning. Scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the evening, overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
